name: TaskRabbit, Inc.
description: Provider of an online mobile marketplace designed to help individuals and small businesses outsource their tasks and deliveries. The company's online mobile marketplace matches freelance labor with local demand, enabling users to find immediate help with everyday tasks, including cleaning, moving, delivery and handyman work.
